MAN.TITLE: casc
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: cascade realization of filter from coefficients

PARAM_ITEM.PARAM_DESCRIPTION: : (4xN)-matrix where each column is a cascade element, the first two column entries being the numerator coefficients and the second two column entries being the denominator coefficients

DESCRIPTION.P: Creates cascade realization of filter from a matrix of coefficients (utility function).
